decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 14th September 2017 and numbered '72 Spring Grove Rd TW3 4BN' (unnumbered) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay 1.9 metre in width and 2.4 metre in depth shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - Before the development is first brought into use, a front boundary wall 600mm high in red sandfaced brickwork shall be erected to the front elevation of the garden on both sides of the vehicle access for the full width of the frontage, excepting a 1.2 metre wide gap to provide a foot path to the front door of the property. This wall shall be permanently retained thereafter.

Condition : 5 - Before the development is first brought into use, a planter  measuring at least one metre wide and one metre deep, and no more than 600mm high, (as shown on drawing '72 Spring Grove Rd TW3 4BN' [unnumbered] received 14th September 2017) shall be installed within the south eastern corner of the site and permanently retained.
